scripts.copy-deps: mkdir -p web/static/dist/js web/static/dist/css && cp node_modules/htmx.org/dist/htmx.min.js web/static/dist/js/ && cp node_modules/alpinejs/dist/cdn.min.js web/static/dist/js/alpine.min.js && cp node_modules/@alpinejs/sort/dist/cdn.min.js web/static/dist/js/alpine-sort.min.js && cp node_modules/@alpinejs/collapse/dist/cdn.min.js web/static/dist/js/alpine-collapse.min.js && cp -r node_modules/tinymce web/static/dist/js/ && cp node_modules/klaro/dist/klaro-no-css.js web/static/dist/js/klaro.min.js && cp node_modules/klaro/dist/klaro.css web/static/dist/css/klaro.css
